summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6236 for the improvement of the alley in Block 28, Lake Union Addition, as established by Ordinance No. 88566, being the alley in the block between Densmore Ave. and Wallingford Ave. from North 39th Street to North 40th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 89499, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
